pkgmetadata.longdescription: Digg-like paginator for Django.Originaly posted on Django snippets site by miracle2k http://blog.elsdoerfer.name/https://djangosnippets.org/snippets/773/To setup use pip install django_digg_paginatorCan be used with generic ListView as simple asfrom digg_paginator import DiggPaginatorclass MyCustomView(ListView): paginator_class = DiggPaginatorand addig a temaplate like in origial django snippet info
